description: This file implements a Node.js/Express proxy server handler for Jira API authentication, specifically handling '/jira-authenticate' POST requests by forwarding credentials and returning user data or errors.

methods.name: module.exports
methods.description: Exposes a function to set up the '/jira-authenticate' POST route that proxies Jira API authentication requests.

methods.name: async (req, res) => { ... }
methods.description: Handles the incoming authentication request, validates parameters, constructs auth headers, forwards request to Jira, and responds with user data or error messages.
